verbose_text: These include DnaJ homologues, isoforms of Rab, Rap, Ras and Rho, the mitotic regulator spindly, and the protein kinase MAPKAPK3 that is activated by p38 MKK (MAPK kinase) [XREF_BIBR], which, to our knowledge, has not previously been reported to be farnesylated, but terminates in a CAAX motif.
evidence: p38 MKK (MAPK kinase) [ XREF_BIBR ], which, to our knowledge, has not previously been reported to be farnesylated
